org.apache.ambari.server.orm.dao

Class HostVersionDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.orm.dao.CrudDAO<HostVersionEntity,Long>
      • org.apache.ambari.server.orm.dao.HostVersionDAO

  • public class HostVersionDAO
extends CrudDAO<HostVersionEntity,Long>
    The HostVersionDAO class manages the HostVersionEntity instances associated with a host. Each host can have multiple stack versions in RepositoryVersionState.INSTALLED which are installed, exactly one stack version that is either RepositoryVersionState.CURRENT or RepositoryVersionState.INSTALLING.

        Parameters:
        clusterName - Cluster name
        stackId - Stack (e.g., HDP-2.2)

        Returns:

      • findByClusterStackVersionAndHost

        public HostVersionEntity findByClusterStackVersionAndHost(String clusterName,
                                                          StackId stackId,
                                                          String version,
                                                          String hostName)
        Retrieve the single host version for the given cluster, stack name, stack version, and host name.
        This query is slow and not suitable for frequent use.
        Parameters:
        clusterName - Cluster name
        stackId - Stack ID (e.g., HDP-2.2)
        version - Stack version (e.g., 2.2.0.1-995)
        hostName - FQDN of host
        Returns:
        Returns the single host version that matches the criteria.
